battleGoals.name: Acrobatic
battleGoals.text: Lose a card to negate 5 or more damage.

battleGoals.name: Ambusher
battleGoals.text: Open a door and end your move action adjacent to a monster in the revealed room.

battleGoals.name: Assassin
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster before it takes any actions in the scenario.

battleGoals.name: Assistant
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster attacked by an ally earlier in the round.

battleGoals.name: Bastion
battleGoals.text: Be adjacent to at least two monsters while standing on a door hex.

battleGoals.name: Bully
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster afflicted by a negative condition.

battleGoals.name: Contagious
battleGoals.text: While afflicted by a negative condition, apply any negative condition to a monster.

battleGoals.name: Covetous
battleGoals.text: Never collect a money token from end-of-turn looting.

battleGoals.name: Cuddler
battleGoals.text: Take a rest only on rounds in which an ally is also taking a long or short rest.

battleGoals.name: Discriminating
battleGoals.text: Kill no elite monsters or bosses during the scenario.

battleGoals.name: Distracted
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster you are not adjacent to while adjacent to another monster.

battleGoals.name: Drowsy
battleGoals.text: Declare a long rest while at your maximum hit point value.

battleGoals.name: Elitist
battleGoals.text: Kill only elite monsters.

battleGoals.name: Exterminator
battleGoals.text: Kill three monsters in the same round.

battleGoals.name: Fearful
battleGoals.text: Never end your turn adjacent to a monster.

battleGoals.name: Feeble
battleGoals.text: Be the first player to become exhausted.

battleGoals.name: Feral
battleGoals.text: Have the most cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.

battleGoals.name: Finisher
battleGoals.text: Kill the last monster to die in the scenario.

battleGoals.name: Hesitant
battleGoals.text: Never go first in a round's initiative.

battleGoals.name: Hothead
battleGoals.text: Add two cards to your lost pile before your first rest.

battleGoals.name: Instigator
battleGoals.text: Except when long resting, never go last in a round's initiative.

battleGoals.name: Insulting
battleGoals.text: Apply another negative condition to a monster already afflicted by one.

battleGoals.name: Limping
battleGoals.text: Move using only basic move actions.

battleGoals.name: Lucky
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster with an attack with disadvantage.

battleGoals.name: Marksman
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster three or more hexes away from you.

battleGoals.name: Miser
battleGoals.text: Never exit a room while money tokens remain in it.

battleGoals.name: Mugger
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster and loot its money token on the same turn.

battleGoals.name: Multitasker
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster and open a door on the same round.

battleGoals.name: Paranoid
battleGoals.text: End each of your turns adjacent to a wall or obstacle.

battleGoals.name: Peacemonger
battleGoals.text: Never deal the killing blow to a monster.

battleGoals.name: Perforated
battleGoals.text: Lose 6 or more hit points in a single round.

battleGoals.name: Pickpocket
battleGoals.text: Perform a loot action while adjacent to at least two monsters.

battleGoals.name: Pincushion
battleGoals.text: Get attacked by three or more monsters in the same round.

battleGoals.name: Prosperous
battleGoals.text: Collect three or more money tokens in the same turn.

battleGoals.name: Ravager
battleGoals.text: Play two cards for their lost actions on the same turn.

battleGoals.name: Recluse
battleGoals.text: Never end your turn adjacent to an ally.

battleGoals.name: Reserved
battleGoals.text: Have the fewest cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.

battleGoals.name: Restless
battleGoals.text: Move at least one hex on each of your turns (except when long resting).

battleGoals.name: Retaliator
battleGoals.text: Don't make any attacks in the scenario until after you've taken damage for the first time.

battleGoals.name: Ritualistic
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster when two or more elements are strong or waning.

battleGoals.name: Scavenger
battleGoals.text: Collect more money tokens than any other player.

battleGoals.name: Shadow
battleGoals.text: End each of your turns adjacent to an ally.

battleGoals.name: Sharpshooter
battleGoals.text: Kill a monster in a different room (neither of you may be on a doorway tile).

battleGoals.name: Slayer
battleGoals.text: Kill two monsters in the same round.

battleGoals.name: Sleepless
battleGoals.text: Take damage during the same round you take a long rest.

battleGoals.name: Sober
battleGoals.text: Use no potions during the scenario.

battleGoals.name: Sociable
battleGoals.text: Never leave a room with a character ally remaining in it.

battleGoals.name: Specialized
battleGoals.text: Don't use any basic actions.

battleGoals.name: Stalwart
battleGoals.text: Never leave a hex adjacent to a monster.

battleGoals.name: Stubborn
battleGoals.text: Do not lose any cards to negate damage during the scenario.

battleGoals.name: Thorough
battleGoals.text: Never exit a room with monsters remaining in it.

battleGoals.name: Untouchable
battleGoals.text: Take no damage.

battleGoals.name: Wasteful
battleGoals.text: Lose a card to negate 2 or less damage from an attack.

battleGoals.name: Winded
battleGoals.text: Never have fewer than one card in your hand.
